document.full_text: japanese prime minister naoto kan will step down by august if not earlier due to growing calls from the opposition and within his own ruling party to resign as quickly as possible, kyodo news agency reported on saturday.
document.title: japan pm kan to step down by august: report
lines_and_colors: japanese prime minister naoto kan will step down by august if not earlier due to growing calls from the opposition and within his own ruling party to resign as quickly as possible, kyodo news agency reported on saturday.
